mapper.sql: ID, MonitorType, FieldToken, FieldName, FieldDataType, FieldClass, FieldDesc, FieldUnitID, ParentID, CreateType, ExValues, DisplayOrder
mapper.insert: insert into tb_monitor_type_field (MonitorType, FieldToken, FieldName, FieldDataType, FieldClass, FieldDesc, FieldUnitID, ParentID, CreateType, ExValues, DisplayOrder) values (#{monitorType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fieldToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldClass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fieldDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldUnitID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exValues,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update tb_monitor_type_field
MonitorType = #{monitorType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FieldToken = #{fieldToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FieldName = #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FieldDataType = #{fieldDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FieldClass = #{fieldClass,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FieldDesc = #{fieldDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FieldUnitID = #{fieldUnitID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ParentID = #{parentID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CreateType = #{createType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ExValues = #{exValues,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DisplayOrder = #{displayOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_monitor_type_field set MonitorType = #{monitorType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FieldToken = #{fieldToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FieldName = #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FieldDataType = #{fieldDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FieldClass = #{fieldClass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FieldDesc = #{fieldDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FieldUnitID = #{fieldUnitID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ParentID = #{parentID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateType = #{createType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ExValues = #{exValues,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DisplayOrder = #{displayOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select distinct MonitorType from tb_monitor_type_field
FieldName like concat('%',#{fuzzyFieldName},'%')
and FieldToken like concat('%',#{fuzzyFieldToken},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into tb_monitor_type_field (MonitorType, FieldName, FieldToken, FieldDataType, FieldClass,FieldDesc, FieldUnitID, ParentID, DisplayOrder, CreateType, ExValues) values (#{item.monitorType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fieldToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fieldDataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fieldClass,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.fieldDesc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.fieldUnitID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.parentID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.displayOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.exValues,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select field.*, formula.Formula, formula.DisplayFormula from tb_monitor_type_field as field left join (select * from tb_template_formula where TemplateID = #{templateID}) as formula on formula.FieldID = field.ID where field.MonitorType = #{monitorType} and FieldClass != 3
mapper.delete: delete from tb_monitor_type_field where MonitorType in #{type}
mapper.select:
select tf.*, itf.MonitorItemID as itemID, itf.Alias from tb_monitor_type_field as tf left join tb_monitor_item_field as itf on itf.MonitorTypeFieldID = tf.ID where itf.MonitorItemID in
#{id}

select tf.id as fieldID, tf.FieldToken, tf.FieldName, tf.FieldDesc,tf.FieldUnitID,u.EngUnit,itf.MonitorItemID as itemID ,itf.Alias as fieldAlias from tb_monitor_type_field as tf left join tb_monitor_item_field as itf on itf.MonitorTypeFieldID = tf.ID left join tb_data_unit as u on u.id = tf.FieldUnitID where itf.MonitorItemID in #{id}
